titles.title: A bill for the relief of Otto Orenstein.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Immigration and Refugee Affairs.

bill.summary: 4/19/1993--Introduced. Directs the Secretary of the Treasury to pay a specified sum to a named individual as full compensation for being involuntarily detained at the Sand Island Detention Camp between 1941 and 1942.
